title: Skoda Auto reports 2.7% drop in deliveries in first nine months
text:
Skoda Auto reports 2.7% drop in deliveries in first nine months

Stock Markets 19 minutes ago (Oct 16, 2019 04:10AM ET)

PRAGUE (Reuters) - Skoda Auto's global deliveries dropped 2.7% to 913,700 cars in the first nine months compared with the same period last year, the subsidiary of Germany's Volkswagen (DE: ) said on Wednesday. The carmaker said that the decrease was mainly caused by further decline in China, where deliveries fell by 22.3%. On the other hand, shipments rose in Europe and in Russia, Skoda said.

Skoda Auto reports 2.7% drop in deliveries in first nine months
description: Skoda Auto reports 2.7% drop in deliveries in first nine months
